API-First TypeScript Service Improvements

Type Safety and Generation

  1. OpenAPI Integration

    • [x] Add OpenAPI to TypeScript generation using @hey-api/openapi-ts
    • [x] Replace manual Resource interfaces with generated types
    • [x] Add type generation to the build process
    • [x] Ensure generated types are used in ResourceController and ResourceService
      ✨ Completed:
    • Integrated @hey-api/openapi-ts for type generation
    • Updated resource models to use generated types
    • Implemented proper date handling between entity and API types
    • Added type transformations in the repository layer

  2. Runtime Type Validation

    • [x] Add Zod schemas for the existing ResourceCreateDto and ResourceUpdateDto
    • [x] Replace express-openapi-validator with Zod middleware
    • [x] Add request context type safety with custom middleware
    • [x] Add response serialization type safety
      ✨ Completed:
    • Created Zod schemas for all resource types
    • Implemented custom validation middleware using Zod
    • Added type-safe request validation for query, params, and body
    • Integrated validation with error handling system

TypeScript Configuration Improvements

  1. Compiler Options

    • [x] Enable noUncheckedIndexedAccess for array/object access
    • [x] Add exactOptionalPropertyTypes for better DTO handling
    • [x] Enable noImplicitOverride for controller methods
    • [x] Configure paths for better import management
      ✨ Completed:
    • Added strict TypeScript configuration
    • Fixed all type issues related to exactOptionalPropertyTypes
    • Implemented proper path aliases for imports
    • Enhanced type safety across the codebase

  2. Type Declarations

    • [x] Generate proper .d.ts files for the service
    • [x] Add type exports for service clients
    • [x] Improve type documentation with TSDoc
    • [x] Add type tests for public interfaces
      ✨ Completed:
    • Added comprehensive TSDoc documentation to core classes
    • Documented all public interfaces and methods
    • Added detailed type information for parameters and returns
    • Included usage examples and constraints in documentation
